name: MktDiverSvyType
label:
NOTE FOR ENUMERATORS:

This survey has been designed for market/shops visits for in-kind distributions to investigate risks of food diversion.  To investigate for risks of food diversion, enumerators are advised to:

1.  Observe/get an overview of the shop/market area, looking for WFP items or food labelled with the WFP/USAID logos and fill out a Monitoring Observation questionnaire  if WFP items or food labelled with the WFP/USAID logos is  observed. 
2.  Interview 5 shop owners  in the shops/market.
3.  Interview 5 total customers in the shops/market.  The customers can be WFP beneficiaries or not.

The number of shops/markets and customers to be interviewed can be adjusted according to country/area monitoring plan and local context.

Note that the primary objective of this exercise is to investigate signs of food diversion, so enumerators should proceed sensitively and with caution.  Ensure consent is provided for all data collection exercises, including shop observations, and any pictures. 

To start, please select which type of Market Diversion survey you're starting:

name: ADMIN5Name
label: Village level (Admin 5 Level)
choiceList: {'name': 'ADM5Code', 'choices': [{'name': '1', 'label': 'CHECK WITH YOUR LOCAL VAM FOCAL POINT/EMERGENCY DIVISION GEOCORE DATA EXPERT'}]}

name: RESPTrdMktDiverConsentNote
label:
ENUMERATOR TO ASK FOR CONSENT (below):

Hi, my name is _____________ and I work with WFP, who has been recently providing food  assistance in this area. I would like to ask you a few questions about what food items and commodities are being sold in this area.  This should take about 10 minutes.  Any information that you provide will be kept strictly confidential meaning we will not  reveal your personal information.

name: MOMktDiverConsentNote
label:
ENUMERATOR TO ASK FOR CONSENT (below):

Hi, my name is _______________ and I work with WFP, who has been recently providing  assistance in this area. I would like to ask you a few questions about what food items and commodities are being sold in this area.  This should take about 10 minutes.  Any information that you provide will be kept strictly confidential meaning we will never reveal your personal information. You can choose not to answer any or all of the questions if you want.

This can be perpetrated against beneficiaries by armed groups, non-beneficiaries, CP staff, community leaders etc.'}, {'name': '2', 'label': 'Beneficiaries being arrested or taken away by force without a justified reason'}, {'name': '3', 'label': 'Beneficiary / Beneficiaries being killed'}, {'name': '4', 'label': 'Presence of group/s in the FDP that prevent the regular development of the distribution activities'}, {'name': '5', 'label': 'Presence of group/s in the FDP that prevent or difficult the access of beneficiaries to the FDP'}, {'name': '6', 'label': 'Harrasment or physical, psychological, verbal or socio-economic violence to a beneficiary at distribution site based on their gender'}, {'name': '7', 'label': 'Physical, sexual, and/or psychological maltreatment or neglect of a child'}, {'name': '8', 'label': 'Episodes of sexual Harassment, sexual assault by force or coercion, unwanted touching or kissing, threats of physical aggression; psychological blackmailing, having sex as a condition for assistance, name-calling, insisting on anything sexual, including jokes that may be uncomfortable, frightening or hurtful'}, {'name': '9', 'label': 'Use of children for hard manual work by vendors, retailors and/or financial service providers'}, {'name': '10', 'label': 'A breach of security leading to the accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorised disclosure of, or access to, personal data'}, {'name': '11', 'label': 'Cases where a Retailer is allegedly involved in fraud. Fraud is any act or omission, including any misrepresentation, that knowingly misleads, or attempts to mislead, a party to obtain any financial or other advantage, or to avoid any obligation whether for oneself or for others. Without limiting the foregoing, fraud could involve, among other things, misappropriation of cash (for example through fraudulent claims or disbursements) or other assets (for example through fraudulent shipments or falsifying inventory records) or fraudulent statements (for example through purposefully misreporting or omitting information)'}, {'name': '12', 'label': 'Cases where a Cooperating Partner is allegedly involved in fraud. Fraud is any act or omission, including any misrepresentation, that knowingly misleads, or attempts to mislead, a party to obtain any financial or other advantage, or to avoid any obligation whether for oneself or for others. Without limiting the foregoing, fraud could involve, among other things, misappropriation of cash (for example through fraudulent claims or disbursements) or other assets (for example through fraudulent shipments or falsifying inventory records) or fraudulent statements (for example through purposefully misreporting or omitting information)'}, {'name': '13', 'label': 'Cases where a Transporter is allegedly involved in fraud. Fraud is any act or omission, including any misrepresentation, that knowingly misleads, or attempts to mislead, a party to obtain any financial or other advantage, or to avoid any obligation whether for oneself or for others. Without limiting the foregoing, fraud could involve, among other things, misappropriation of cash (for example through fraudulent claims or disbursements) or other assets (for example through fraudulent shipments or falsifying inventory records) or fraudulent statements (for example through purposefully misreporting or omitting information)'}, {'name': '14', 'label': 'Cases where WFP staff is allegedly involved in fraud. Fraud is any act or omission, including any misrepresentation, that knowingly misleads, or attempts to mislead, a party to obtain any financial or other advantage, or to avoid any obligation whether for oneself or for others. Without limiting the foregoing, fraud could involve, among other things, misappropriation of cash (for example through fraudulent claims or disbursements) or other assets (for example through fraudulent shipments or falsifying inventory records) or fraudulent statements (for example through purposefully misreporting or omitting information)'}, {'name': '15', 'label': 'Cases where a Retailer is allegedly involved in corruption and/or extortion. Corruption is the offering, giving, receiving or soliciting, directly or indirectly, or attempt to do so, of anything of value to improperly influence the actions of another party. Corruption could involve, among other things, an abuse of a conflict of interest, improper gratuities (including unauthorized acceptance of honours, gifts or remuneration) or bribery (including kickbacks). Extortion involves requesting money or favours in exchange for receiving their entitlement'}, {'name': '16', 'label': 'Cases where a Cooperating Partner is allegedly involved in corruption and/or extortion. Corruption is the offering, giving, receiving or soliciting, directly or indirectly, or attempt to do so, of anything of value to improperly influence the actions of another party. Corruption could involve, among other things, an abuse of a conflict of interest, improper gratuities (including unauthorized acceptance of honours, gifts or remuneration) or bribery (including kickbacks). Extortion involves requesting money or favours in exchange for receiving their entitlement'}, {'name': '17', 'label': 'Cases where WFP staff is allegedly involved in corruption and/or extortion. Corruption is the offering, giving, receiving or soliciting, directly or indirectly, or attempt to do so, of anything of value to improperly influence the actions of another party. Corruption could involve, among other things, an abuse of a conflict of interest, improper gratuities (including unauthorized acceptance of honours, gifts or remuneration) or bribery (including kickbacks). Extortion involves requesting money or favours in exchange for receiving their entitlement'}, {'name': '18', 'label': 'The Cooperating Partner reports being requested to pay additional costs by the transporter e.g. labour/offloading or other costs'}, {'name': '19', 'label': 'CP is collaborating with military, religious or political parties, compromising the humanitarian principles of neutrality, impartiality, independence and humanity'}, {'name': '20', 'label': 'A situation in which a person is in a position to derive personal benefit from actions or decisions made in their official capacity. For example if a family relative of WFP/CP staff member is hired to work at the food distribution site'}, {'name': '21', 'label': 'Collusive practice is an arrangement among two or more parties designed to achieve an improper purpose. This can include collusion between CP staff/military/retailers/community members to mismanage WFP food'}, {'name': '22', 'label': 'Any party involved (including but not limited to WFP staff, CP, Retailer, Transporter, PMC, local authorities, military, or traditional leaders) in the practice of persuading someone to do something by using force or threats'}, {'name': '23', 'label': 'Theft of assistance (food commodities, cash, vouchers) from a place/project site (not from a person), typically in a disorderly manner as a result of an attack or unrest'}, {'name': '24', 'label': "The act of taking another person's belongings at the FDP/project site by anyone (including a persone's personal documentation)"}, {'name': '25', 'label': 'Warehouse theft/robery can be from external sources (such as burglars) but also from internal sources (WFP staff, Retailer, CP, Transporter)'}, {'name': '26', 'label': 'Sale of WFP food at a commercial level by CP/community authorities. This can also include WFP livelihood materials, seedlings, livestock stolen or diverted by beneficiary/CP'}, {'name': '27', 'label': 'Cooperating partner staff or management committee or retailer serving a particular person or group before others based on the groups, classes, or other categories to which they belong or are perceived to belong'}, {'name': '28', 'label': 'Treatment of one individual or group of individuals in a manner that is likely to lead to greater benefits, access, rights, opportunities or status than those of another individual or group of individuals based on personal acquaintance'}, {'name': '29', 'label': 'Beneficiaries treated disrespectfully by CP/WFP/Community workers/retailers at distribution site'}, {'name': '30', 'label': 'Activity running behind schedule due to the delay of any of its tasks'}, {'name': '31', 'label': 'Distribution does not occur as per schedule. For example instances in which CP technical staff is not available at a FFA project site.
